KEVINFUNG

A machine learning engineer from London working at Expedia Group. I previously worked as a data scientist and data engineer in the banking industry on a variety of leading projects in wealth and payments during my time at Capco. Studied at the University of Sussex and Imperial College London.

Currently I'm building systems serving thousands of pipelines and machine learning models to compete in the algorithmic marketing space.

This place will be my test grounds for putting my thoughts out - on anything and everything I find interesting.
